game.name: It's Kooky - Land of Aotearoa
game.shortDescription: Welcome to another kooky game! This time, you will explore the lands of Aotearoa and discover all the hidden quirky elements throughout the game which is full of challenges, histories and, most importantly, fun!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Welcome to another kooky game! This time, you will explore the lands of Aotearoa and discover all the hidden quirky elements throughout the game which is full of challenges, histories and, most importantly, fun!

reviewHighlights.text: Kooky offers a light-hearted, doodle-driven spin on the hidden object genre with its focus on New Zealand’s culture and quirks. The game’s charm is ro...
